sentences.en: He is talking to Tom on the internal telephone.
sentences.cn: 他正在内线电话上与汤姆交谈.

sentences.en: It was published in the "Annals of Internal Medicine".
sentences.cn: 它发表在《内科医学年鉴》上。

sentences.en: Some of the internal walls of my house are made of plasterboard.
sentences.cn: 我家房子的一些内墙是石膏板做的。

sentences.en: The Internal Revenue Service sought to disallow the payments.
sentences.cn: 国内收入署试图驳回这些缴纳款。

sentences.en: the internal structure of a building
The parliament described the decree as interference in the republic's internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 议会形容此法令为对共和国内政的干涉。

sentences.en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentences.cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂.

sentences.en: The team has been plagued by indecision and internal divisions.
sentences.cn: 优柔寡断与内部分裂深深困扰着该团队。

sentences.en: There is an internal circuit breaker to protect the instrument from overload.
sentences.cn: 内置有断路器，防止设备过载。

sentences.en: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

sentences.en: These acts constitute an interference in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.cn: 这种行动构成对别国内政的干涉.

sentences.en: They had the right to administer their own internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们有权料理自己的事务.

sentences.en: We do not intend to be drawn into the internal strife.
sentences.cn: 我们不想卷入内乱之中.

sentences.en: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.cn: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.en: What is missing, however, is an internal, artistic cohesion.
sentences.cn: 不过，缺乏的是一种内在的艺术凝聚力。

words.tran_cn: 使（习俗等经吸收同化而）内在化；使藏在心底

trans.tran_cn: 内部的，体内的，国内的，内心的
